StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdatePersonnelBillet]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID int, @Recrui.ngRoleID varchar(2), @BilletBeginDate date.me, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
DECLARE @DBID INT DECLARE @DBNAME NVARCHAR(128) SET @DBID = DB_ID() SET @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @MaxBilletBeginDate date.me DECLARE @MaxBilletEndDate date.me
SELECT @MaxBilletBeginDate = MAX(BILLET_BEGIN_DATE) FROM Recruiter_History WHERE Recrui.ng_Person_Id = @PersonId
SELECT @MaxBilletEndDate = MAX(BILLET_END_DATE) FROM Recruiter_History WHERE Recrui.ng_Person_Id = @PersonId
IF @BilletBeginDate < @MaxBilletBeginDate BEGIN RAISERROR ('Billet Begin date can not be prior to a previous begin date in the Recruiter history table.', 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
IF @BilletBeginDate < @MaxBilletEndDate BEGIN RAISERROR ('Billet Begin date can not be prior to a previous end date in the Recruiter history table.', 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
DECLARE @BeginDate date.me DECLARE @ShortDescrip.on varchar(15)
SELECT @BeginDate = BILLET_BEGIN_DATE FROM RECRUITING_PERSON WHERE RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = @PersonId
IF @BeginDate != @BilletBeginDate BEGIN SELECT @ShortDescrip.on = rr.Short_Descrip.on FROM Recrui.ng_Person rp, Recrui.ng_Role rr WHERE rp.Recrui.ng_Person_Id = @PersonId and rp.Recrui.ng_Role_id = rr.Recrui.ng_Role_Id
EXEC sp_InsertRecruiterHistory @PersonId = @PersonId, @BeginDate = @BeginDate, @BilletEndDate = @BilletBeginDate, @ShortDescrip.on = @ShortDescrip.on, @UserLogin = @UserLogin
UPDATE RECRUITING_PERSON SET RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = @Recrui.ngRoleID, BILLET_BEGIN_DATE = @BilletBeginDate, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = @PersonID END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
